turns.body: Hello! It looks like you used !<q> before your message. If you’re testing how I interpret special syntax, I’m here to help! While !<q> isn’t a standard command I recognize, I’ll do my best to answer any questions or interpret your intent. How can I assist you today?

Thanks for your message! You used !<o> before your text. While this isn’t a standard command I recognize, I’m here to help with any questions or tasks you have. If you’re experimenting with different prefixes or commands, feel free to let me know what you’d like to achieve, and I’ll do my best to assist!
